se350.elevatorSim.statistics

Class ReportGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • se350.elevatorSim.statistics.ReportGenerator

  • public class ReportGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class that is responsible for storing data about Person instances' waiting times and riding times. It is initialized at the beginning of a simulation and prints out all of the statistics at the end of the simulation.
    Author:
    James R Hagle & Shahzaib Syed

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addReport(PersonDTO result) 
      void addReport(PersonResults report)
      Method for a Person to add their data to the collection of reports in order to analyze all of the people's experiences.
      int getAverageFloorWaitTime(int floor)
      Get the average wait time that people have waited at the floor.
      static ReportGenerator getInstance()
      Enables others to get a reference to this class in singleton fashion.
      int getRideTime(int from, int to)
      Get the average wait time riding from one floor to another
      static void initialize(int numOfFloors)
      Initializes this singleton class, must be called before any calls to getInstance.
      void printFinalReport()
      Prints the final result of the simulation to the console, including all data about avg/min/max wait times, the individual statistics for each person, and the ride times to and from each floor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize(int numOfFloors)
        Initializes this singleton class, must be called before any calls to getInstance.
        Parameters:
        numOfFloors - - The number of floors in the simulation.

      • getInstance

        public static ReportGenerator getInstance()
        Enables others to get a reference to this class in singleton fashion. Can only be called after calling initialize()
        Returns:
        The only instance of the ReportGenerator

      • addReport

        public void addReport(PersonResults report)
        Method for a Person to add their data to the collection of reports in order to analyze all of the people's experiences. Called when a person arrives at their destination.
        Parameters:
        report - - The data about a person that is to be added

      • printFinalReport

        public void printFinalReport()
        Prints the final result of the simulation to the console, including all data about avg/min/max wait times, the individual statistics for each person, and the ride times to and from each floor. Called at the end of each simulation run.

      • getAverageFloorWaitTime

        public int getAverageFloorWaitTime(int floor)
        Get the average wait time that people have waited at the floor.
        Parameters:
        floor - - the Floor to get the information about
        Returns:
        The average number of seconds people have waited at that floor, -1 if nobody has waited at that floor

      • getRideTime

        public int getRideTime(int from,
              int to)
        Get the average wait time riding from one floor to another
        Parameters:
        from - - The floor that the people are riding from
        to - - The floor that the people are riding to
        Returns:
        The average number of seconds the ride has taken, -1 if nobody has ridden from 'from' to 'to'

      • addReport

        public void addReport(PersonDTO result)
